oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: To My Sorrow - Johnny Duncan performance - 1968-05-31
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of To My Sorrow, written by Vic McAlpin, arranged by Bill McElhiney, produced by Frank Jones, recorded on May 31, 1968 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, released by Columbia on June 25, 1968, and performed by Johnny Duncan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnny Duncan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: McAlpin, Vic, 1918-1980; McElhiney, Bill; Jones, Frank, 1928-2005; Columbia Records, Inc; Duncan, Johnny
